mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_club ORDER BY club_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_club (club_id, club_name, logo_url, description, category, introduction, leader_email) VALUES (seq_club.nextval, #{club_name}, #{logo_url}, #{description}, #{category}, #{introduction}, #{leader_email})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_club SET club_name = #{club_name}, logo_url = #{logo_url}, description = #{description}, category = #{category}, introduction = #{introduction}, leader_email = #{leader_email} WHERE club_id = #{club_id}
